ars_artifice.glyph_desc.glyph_anguish: Anguish triggers when you take damage. Amplify increases the required damage to trigger. Dampen reduces the required damage to trigger.
ars_artifice.glyph_desc.glyph_falling: Falling triggers after falling. Amplify increases the amount of blocks to fall before triggering. Dampen reduces the amount of blocks to fall before triggering.
ars_artifice.glyph_desc.glyph_interval: Interval triggers on a loop. Amplify increases the duration between triggers. Dampen reduces the duration between triggers.
ars_artifice.glyph_desc.glyph_landing: Landing triggers when you land. Amplify increases the distance you need to have fallen for it to trigger.
ars_artifice.spell_gem.invalid: There are problems with this spell.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.star: The spell must start with an artifice method glyph.
